controlled_vocabulary.comment: This table provides the restricted vocabulary for the column genetic status in the table sample and is used to give general categories

term.name: haploid
term.description: The organism is in the haploid from

term.name: diploid
term.description: The organism is in its diploid form

term.name: partial_diploid
term.description: The organism exists as a partial diploid

term.name: mutant
term.description: This is a specific mutant of a given organism

term.name: wildtype
term.description: This is an organism unmodified by the experimentalist

term.name: ecotype
term.description: This is an organism characterized as coming from a region

term.name: strain
term.description: This is an organism that has been characterized for many of its loci

term.name: model
term.description: This is an organism being used in a sequencing project for which a lot of genomic information is known

term.name: transformant
term.description: This organism has undergone expression manipulation by a transformation procedure

term.name: model
term.description: This organism has been the focus of a genomic sequencing effort and may be close to fully characterized at the genomic level
